# Gingerbread
Gingerbreads are a species of sentient confectionary, with sugar for blood and cookies for flesh.
## Cookie Biology
Thanks to their anomalous sugar-based biology, Gingerbreads have sugar instead of blood, and can restore blood by eating candies and other sugary foods. They also take 75% less asphyxiation damage, 50% less heat damage, and are completely immune to bloodloss, cold, and cellular damage!
## Drawbacks
Gingerbreads take 50% more blunt damage than other species. Gingerbreads are injured by water, becoming soggy and limp. Your crewmates might be tempted to butcher you to get cookies...
